commands.condition: If within 7 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Only if adjacent, move at least 4 spaces away, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move within 5 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If a red die rolls a single damage
commands.command: Use Targeting Computer to reroll the red die.

commands.condition: If within 10 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - After a Rebel figure voluntarily exits an adjacent space
commands.command: Use Battle Presence ability.
While attacking, apply the effects in the following order: +2 Ac., recover 2 {DMG} if Health is less than 6, +2 {DMG}.

commands.condition: If possible to be adjacent to 2 hostile figures (one being {ATTACK_TARGET})
commands.command: {ACTION} If necessary, move adjacent to those figures, then {ACTION} Use Brutality ability to attack those targets.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} but have LOS
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Force Choke ability on {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} and not LOS to any hostile figures
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.
If {EVADE} does nothing, reroll it. Otherwise, reroll a die with 1 {BLOCK}.
Use the following order: +2 {DMG}, stun, bleed, weaken (via Punishment).

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking a target that does not have a harmful condition
commands.command: Use Contempt ability to apply +1 {SURGE} and then apply Punishment with the {SURGE}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} but already attacked once
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the closest hostile figure for the second attack.
{ACTION} Move within 5 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} but already attacked once
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the closest hostile figure for the second attack.
{ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If 2 other friendly figures are not within attack range or LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use General's Orders ability to move those figures within attack range and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move to be in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.
If within 2 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, use two red and one green dice. Otherwise, use one red, one blue, and one green dice.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is within attack range and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is not adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces and in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to be in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.
{ACTION} Move within 6 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending and attacker is 4 or more spaces away
commands.command: Use Composite Plating to apply +1 {BLOCK} to the defense results
{ACTION} Move within 6 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending and attacker is 4 or more spaces away
commands.command: Use Composite Plating to apply +1 {BLOCK} to the defense results
{ACTION} Move within 6 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - While attacking and defender rolls a dodge or any block result
commands.command: Use Versatile Weaponry to force the defender to reroll a dodge or the highest {BLOCK} rolled.

commands.condition: Reaction - If an attack die is rolled that has no effect (no damage, no surge can be used to any effect)
commands.command: Use Targeting Computer to reroll the die.
{ACTION} Move within 6 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - While attacking and defender rolls a dodge or any block result
commands.command: Use Versatile Weaponry to force the defender to reroll a dodge or the highest {BLOCK} rolled.

commands.condition: Reaction - If an attack die is rolled that has no effect (no damage, no surge can be used to any effect)
commands.command: Use Targeting Computer to reroll the die.
Use Priority Target to ignore figures blocking LOS.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move within 2 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If declaring an attack against a figure within 3 spaces
commands.command: Use Relentless ability.
If within 2 spaces, use 2 red dice. Otherwise, use one blue and one green die.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move within 2 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If declaring an attack against a figure within 3 spaces
commands.command: Use Relentless ability.
If within 2 spaces, use 2 red dice. Otherwise, use one blue and one green die.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is not adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move to be within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is within attack range and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is not adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces and in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to be in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.
{ACTION} Move to be within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to the nearest Trooper or Guardian.
{ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no Troopers or Guardians adjacent to self
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Order ability on a nearby Trooper or Guardian figure to have it move to be adjacent to self.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.

commands.condition: If adjacent to 2 friendly Troopers and those troopers are within range of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Firing Squad ability.
{ACTION} Move within 6 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking and roll a surge
commands.command: Apply Squad Command to an adjacent friendly Trooper.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} or any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Pounce ability to attack {ATTACK_TARGET} or any target, then {ACTION} move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to closest target, then {ACTION} Attack that target, then move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.
Use Cunning ability
{ACTION} Use Pounce ability to attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to closest target, then {ACTION} Attack that target, then move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.
Use Cunning ability
{ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - At the end of the round, if adjacent to a Rebel figure with 2 or less Health left, and not adjacent to any friendly figures
commands.command: Use Self-Destruct ability.
{ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If an attack die is rolled that has no effect (no damage, no surge can be used to any effect)
commands.command: Use Targeting Computer to reroll the die.

commands.condition: Reaction - At the end of the round, if adjacent to a Rebel figure with 2 or less Health left, and not adjacent to any friendly figures
commands.command: Use Self-Destruct ability.
{ACTION} Move within 2 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defending
commands.command: Use Sentinel ability.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defeated
commands.command: Use Vengeance ability.

commands.condition: If possible to be adjacent to 2 hostile figures (preference one being {ATTACK_TARGET})
commands.command: {ACTION} If necessary, move adjacent to those figures, then {ACTION} Use Brutality ability to attack those targets.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - When a friendly figure within 3 spaces is defeated
commands.command: Use Executor ability.
{ACTION} Move within 2 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defending
commands.command: Use Sentinel ability.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defeated
commands.command: Use Vengeance ability and move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} {ACTION} Use Focus Fire ability to attack {ATTACK_TARGET} twice.
{ACTION} Move within 6 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.
Use Defensible ability to add either icon that blocks the most damage.

commands.condition: Reaction - If self or adjacent to another friendly Trooper that has a harmful condition or suffered damage
commands.command: Use Environmental Recovery Gear to 1) heal the harmful condition 2) recover 1 {DMG}.
{ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If self or adjacent to another friendly Trooper that has a harmful condition or suffered damage

{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

{ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET} (next to a friendly Trooper if possible), then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If adjacent to another friendly Trooper while attacking
commands.command: If multiple {SURGE} are rolled and accuracy check is successful, use Squad Training ability to reroll a {SURGE}.
{ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET} (next to a friendly Trooper if possible), then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If adjacent to another friendly Trooper while attacking
commands.command: If multiple {SURGE} are rolled and accuracy check is successful, use Squad Training ability to reroll a {SURGE}.
Use Last Stand ability on the closest figure in this figure's group.

{ACTION} Move behind the closest friendly figure, out of attack range and LOS if possible.

commands.command: Use Relentless ability

commands.command: Use Scattergun ability ability

{ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack that target.
{ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.
Use Efficient Travel.

commands.condition: If adjacent to a friendly figure that is within range and LOS of a target: {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use General's Bombardment ability to order the friendly figure to attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.
{ACTION} Advance 1 toward {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} move towards a friendly figure, prioritizing DROIDS and VEHICLES.
{ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.
